data.why:
MasonX::Maypole will be a front-end for Maypole, that uses Mason.
    Currently, Mason can be integrated into Maypole via
    Maypole::View::Mason, but this module plays to Mason's weaknesses.
    MasonX::Maypole allows Maypole apps to be added to existing Mason
    sites without having to mess around with stand-alone Mason
    interpreters.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (DAVEBAIRD; David R. Baird)
